item.description:
@L0w_Lvl_Wh1p wrote:

thnx[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 09:24:54 AM[/size][hr]=O i have windows vista and i cant open .cfg files???[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 09:25:48 AM[/size][hr]phew dw, i just had 2 pick notepad from the list, sorry lol im dumb sometimes =P

thnx for the help, also can u tell me how to change first log in point?[br][size=1]Posted on: July 07, 2007, 09:27:59 AM[/size][hr]oh and which one of these do i change?

item = 1777	Bow_string	I_need_a_bow_stave_to_attach_this_to.	9.07668834771803	9.07668834771803	9.58564784604154

1 more thing lol how do i work out the price, dont u have to times, devide or whatever?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help changing the item prices, e.g. what they alk for

item.title: Need help changing the item prices, e.g. what they alk for
item.dc:creator: @pmgz pmgz
item.description:
@pmgz wrote:

well the easy way out is to search for TotPrice = (ShopValue * 1.26875); //Calculates price for 1 item, in db is stored for 0 items (strange but true) in client.java and change the 1.26875 to a 1. Then go change the prices in items.cfg

Read full topic
